name: Speed in Space - Free
description:
Point and click arcade game in the speed of light. Steer the ship in the endless space. Avoid space debris that floats around. Do you have nerves of steel, which is required for those extreme speeds?

Free version, NO pay to win. All features for free, NO accidental "in-app purchases".

How to Play?
Tap the screen to change track.
Tablet Users?
Turn your tablet to get a better view.
